description:
This component renders an avatar.

### Example

```jsx
const accountId = props.accountId || context.accountId;
const profile = props.profile || Social.get(`${accountId}/profile/**`, "final");

return (
  <Widget
    src="near/widget/DIG.Avatar"
    props={{
      alt: accountId,
      image: profile.image,
      size: "medium",
    }}
  />
);
```

### Props

`alt`
- type: string
- optional
- A description of the user's avatar (typically their account ID)

`image`
- type: object
- required
- An object that's compatible with `mob.near/widget/Image`: https://near.org/near/widget/ComponentDetailsPage?src=mob.near/widget/Image&tab=source

`size`
- type: string
- optional
- values: `small` (default), `medium`

### HTML Attributes

All other props will be forwarded through to the wrapping `<div>` element. EG: `id`, `className`, `aria-*`.
name: DIG.Avatar
